sentence.Network_en: Given the fraught nature of the subject, the results are gratifyingly uncontroversial.
sentence.Network_cn: 考虑到这个学科令人担忧的本性, 这结果让人满意得无可争议.

sentence.Network_en: The performance was at a gratifyingly high level.
